record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2557
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2557 -- (Senate - January 28, 2008)

[Page: S370]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, S. 2557 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2557) to extend the Protect America Act of 2007 until July 1, 2009.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings with respect to this bill at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
